name: Goblin
description:
The land is full of adventurers. I sit around the Guild Hall, awaiting my next quest. There are always plenty, as there is no end to goblins, yet somehow, these past couple of days, it has been quiet. Every guild member is giving it their all in order to quell as many goblins as possible. Now, many of us are left with nothing but sitting around and waiting for the Guild to post more jobs for us.

Some have chosen to just laze about, drinking ale and singing songs. But not me. I cannot rest easy knowing that somewhere out there, goblins still roam about, looting and pillaging. I need something much more than just alcohol and songs.

Yet in the guild, there is no scarcity of other forms of distractions, forms which I like, too.


  • Fight pitched tactical battles on three-dimensional battlefields. The completely revamped AI enables enemies to adapt their tactics to the situation, providing a battle system that always keeps you thinking and never grows old.
  • Theorycraft your way through endless combinations of classes, equipment, skills, and magic.
